lines.text: Here's to art. The only world where age comes before beauty.

If it has a crooked aspect, it has occurred to me.
In that case, accept my condolences.
How much progress have you made with Miss Vasarri?
Well, either she's extremely naïve, or, what is worse, she's just plain honest.
Dear boy, when you ask for money, you're appealing to the most unresponsive side of my nature.
Don't be so unhappy. Marriage is a lottery. You may be getting a prize.
Well, if it's a lottery, there ought to be a law against it.
Do you think deep down he loves her?
Dear boy, love is something that takes place before marriage, not during, and never after. For proof, ask any of my four ex-wives.
the impractical and the practical. And you cannot do business with the impractical. The best thing to do is to stay away from them. They confuse faith and ethics for business.
Have you got a faith, Felix?

Certainly, my faith is that nothing is worth believing in. My faith is faithlessness, and so is yours. If we give that up, what are we going to live by? Man has to believe in something, even if it's nothing.
Did you ever do something for anybody? I mean, without getting paid for it?
Once I had such an impulse - but I managed to overcome it. After all, why should I be a hypocrite?
